reference.title: Open Virtual Appliance (OVA) configuration requirements
reference.shortdesc: IBM StoredIQ is deployed as virtual appliances and is supported in VMware ESXi 5.0 (all fix pack levels) or VMware ESXi 6.0 (all fix pack levels) environments. You must have a virtual infrastructure that meets the IBM StoredIQ hardware requirements.

ul.li:
Storage:
Primary disk (vmdisk1): 21 GB
Data disk (vmdisk2): 10 GB

Storage:
Primary disk (vmdisk1): 100 GB
Data disk (vmdisk2): 75 GB
Swap disk (vmdisk3): 40 - 100 GB
